original_text: Now Jesus had spoken of his death, but they thought that he meant taking rest in sleep.
korean_text: 예수는 그의 죽음을 가리켜 말씀하신 것이나 그들은 잠들어 쉬는 것을 가리켜 말씀하심인 줄 생각하는지라

sentences.original_text: Now Jesus had spoken of his death,
that he meant taking rest in sleep.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 잠을 자며 쉬는 것을 의미한다고
